name: Gusto Caffe
text:
Below is the plain text transcription of the menus for Gusto Caffe and the associated beverage boards, using British/standardised spelling.

GUSTO CAFFE FOOD MENU
Pancakes – 12 Three Thin Finnish style pancakes served with pancake syrup.

Tuscan Breakfast Panino - 11 Fresh baked bread with basil cream, roasted red peppers and onions, eggs, and provolone cheese.

Mushroom Spinach Onion & Gorgonzola Pastry - 10 Sautéed mushroom and onion with gorgonzola cheese baked in puff pastry topped with tomato sauce and parmesan cheese.

Arancini Rice Balls – 12 Lightly breaded arborio rice balls with Bolognese filling and provolone cheese, served with tomato sauce.

Chicken Cutlets (fingers) - 14 Italian breading on thinly sliced chicken breasts, served with a sweet chilli lime sauce.

Italian Salad – 12 Mixed greens with roasted red peppers, beans, chic peas, tomato and cheese served with a balsamic vinaigrette.

Grilled Romaine Salad - 14 Grilled romaine lettuce with crispy fresh romaine, house made croutons, crispy pancetta, parmesan cheese, fresh lemon and a balsamic caesar dressing.

Meatball Bowl - 15 Six house made Italian beef meatballs, served in tomato sauce with parmesan cheese and bread.

Meatball Sub – 12 House made Italian beef meatballs in a fresh submarine bun with tomato sauce and cheese.

Sausage Peperonata Sandwich - 8 Grilled sausage with sautéed peppers, onions and tomato.

Warm Mortadella Panini – 12 Pan fried mortadella with dijonaise, cheese and pickles.

BBQ Chicken Flatbread - 14 Roasted Chicken – Barbeque Sauce – Cheese - Roasted on a thin crispy shell.

Roasted Vegetable Flatbread - 13 Roasted Vegetables – Tomato - Goat Cheese - Mozzarella.

Crispy Italian Flatbread – 15 Crispy calabrese, balsamic onions, tomato, Scamorzza & Mozzarella cheese.

COFFEES
DOLCE DRIP COFFEE Regular Roast or Decaf SMALL $2.25 MEDIUM $2.50 LARGE $3.00

ESPRESSO SINGLE SHOT $2.25 DOUBLE SHOT $2.50

ESPRESSO CON PANNA Espresso, Vanilla, Hot Milk Foam, Panna SMALL $3.75

CORTADO 1/2 Espresso, 1/2 Steamed Milk, Served Short SMALL $4.00

CAFFÈ AMERICANO 1/4 Espresso, 3/4 Hot Water SMALL $3.00 MEDIUM $3.50 LARGE $4.00

SPECIALTY COFFEES
SMALL $4.50 MEDIUM $5.00 LARGE $5.50

CAPPUCCINO 1/2 Espresso, 1/4 Steamed Milk, 1/4 Foam

LATTE 1/4 Espresso, 3/4 Steamed Milk

LATTE MACCHIATO Light Espresso, Steamed Milk

CAFFÈ MOCHA 1/4 Espresso, 1/4 Chocolate, 1/2 Hot Milk

Flavour Shot $0.50

COLD BEVERAGES
ICED COFFEE $3.50 Caramel, Vanilla, Chocolate, Hazelnut, or Black Cherry

ICED LATTE $5.25 Espresso, Milk, Micro Foam

ICED MOCHA $5.25 Chocolate, Espresso, Milk, Micro Foam

ICED VANILLA CHAI $5.25 Dolce Chai, Vanilla, Milk, Micro Foam

AFFOGATO $7.00 Espresso poured over Vanilla Gelato

FRUIT REFRESHER $5.25 Caffeine-Free Fruit Juice over ice, topped with Coconut Milk Dragon Fruit, Strawberry, Peach, Passion Fruit, Mango, or Orange

TEAS
TEA LATTE Tea, Steamed Milk SMALL $3.50 MEDIUM $3.75 LARGE $4.00

DECAFFEINATED TEA $3.50

Black Tea

Decaf Chai

Sweet Lemon Green Rooibos

Peppermint

Chilli Chocolate Honeybush

Earl Grey
